pma:database.name: project_db
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `CUSTOMERS` ( `CUSTONER_ID` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `CUSTOMER_FIRST_NAME` varchar(1024) DEFAULT NULL, `CUSTOMER_LAST_NAME` varchar(1024) DEFAULT NULL, `CUSTOMER_MIDDLE_NAME` varchar(1024) DEFAULT NULL, `ORGANIZATION_ID` int(11) NOT NULL, `CUSTOMER_TYPE_ID` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`CUSTONER_ID`), KEY `CUSTOMER_TYPE_ID` (`CUSTOMER_TYPE_ID`), KEY `ORGANIZATION_ID1` (`ORGANIZATION_ID`), CONSTRAINT `CUSTOMER_TYPE_ID` FOREIGN KEY (`CUSTOMER_TYPE_ID`) REFERENCES `CUSTOMER_TYPES` (`CUSTOMER_TYPE_ID`) ON UPDATE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT `ORGANIZATION_ID1` FOREIGN KEY (`ORGANIZATION_ID`) REFERENCES `ORGANIZATIONS` (`ORGANIZATION_ID`) ON UPDATE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=3 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE `EXECUTORS` ( `EXECUTOR_ID` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `EXECUTOR_FIRST_NAME` varchar(1024) DEFAULT NULL, `EXECUTOR_LAST_NAME` varchar(1024) DEFAULT NULL, `EXECUTOR_MIDDLE_NAME` varchar(1024) DEFAULT NULL, `ORGANIZATION_ID` int(11) NOT NULL, `EXECUTOR_TYPE_ID` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`EXECUTOR_ID`), KEY `ORGANIZATION_ID` (`ORGANIZATION_ID`), KEY `EXECUTOR_TYPE_ID` (`EXECUTOR_TYPE_ID`), CONSTRAINT `EXECUTOR_TYPE_ID` FOREIGN KEY (`EXECUTOR_TYPE_ID`) REFERENCES `EXECUTOR_TYPES` (`EXECUTOR_TYPE_ID`) ON UPDATE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT `ORGANIZATION_ID` FOREIGN KEY (`ORGANIZATION_ID`) REFERENCES `ORGANIZATIONS` (`ORGANIZATION_ID`) ON UPDATE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=4 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE `ORGANIZATIONS` ( `ORGANIZATION_ID` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `ORGANIZATION_NAME` varchar(1024) NOT NULL, `ORGANIZATION_MANAGEMENT_TYPE_ID` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`ORGANIZATION_ID`), KEY `ORGANIZATION_MANAGEMENT_TYPE_ID` (`ORGANIZATION_MANAGEMENT_TYPE_ID`), CONSTRAINT `ORGANIZATION_MANAGEMENT_TYPE_ID` FOREIGN KEY (`ORGANIZATION_MANAGEMENT_TYPE_ID`) REFERENCES `ORGANIZATION_MANAGEMENT_TYPES` (`ORGANIZATION_MANAGEMENT_TYPE_ID`) ON UPDATE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=4 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE `PROJECTS` ( `PROJECT_ID` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `NAME` varchar(1024) DEFAULT NULL, `PLAN_DATE_START` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `PLAN_DATE_END` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `FACT_DATE_END` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `FACT_DATE_START` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `EXECUTOR_ID` int(11) NOT NULL, `CUSTOMER_ID` int(11) NOT NULL, `PROJECT_METHODOLOGY_ID` int(11) NOT NULL, `PROJECT_BUDGET` decimal(10,0) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`PROJECT_ID`), KEY `EXECUTOR_ID` (`EXECUTOR_ID`), KEY `CUSTOMER_ID` (`CUSTOMER_ID`), KEY `PROJECT_METHODOLOGY_ID` (`PROJECT_METHODOLOGY_ID`), CONSTRAINT `CUSTOMER_ID` FOREIGN KEY (`CUSTOMER_ID`) REFERENCES `CUSTOMERS` (`CUSTONER_ID`) ON UPDATE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT `EXECUTOR_ID` FOREIGN KEY (`EXECUTOR_ID`) REFERENCES `EXECUTORS` (`EXECUTOR_ID`) ON UPDATE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT `PROJECT_METHODOLOGY_ID` FOREIGN KEY (`PROJECT_METHODOLOGY_ID`) REFERENCES `PROJECT_METHODOLOGIES` (`PROJECT_METHODOLOGY_ID`) ON UPDATE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=3 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE `PROJECT_CASES` ( `PROJECT_CASE_ID` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `PROJECT_CASE_DISCRIPTION` text NOT NULL, `PROJECT_CASE_SOLUTION` text NOT NULL, `PROJECT_CASE_STAGE_ID` int(11) NOT NULL, `PROJECT_CASE_EFFICIENCY` double NOT NULL, `PROJECT_ID` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`PROJECT_CASE_ID`), KEY `PROJECT_CASE_STAGE_ID3` (`PROJECT_CASE_STAGE_ID`), KEY `PROJECT_ID5` (`PROJECT_ID`), CONSTRAINT `PROJECT_CASE_STAGE_ID3` FOREIGN KEY (`PROJECT_CASE_STAGE_ID`) REFERENCES `PROJECT_STAGES` (`PROJECT_STAGE_ID`) ON UPDATE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT `PROJECT_ID5` FOREIGN KEY (`PROJECT_ID`) REFERENCES `PROJECTS` (`PROJECT_ID`) ON UPDATE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE `PROJECT_METHODOLOGIES` ( `PROJECT_METHODOLOGY_ID` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `PROJECT_METHODOLOGY_NAME` varchar(1024) DEFAULT NULL, `PROJECT_METHODOLOGIES_TYPE_ID` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`PROJECT_METHODOLOGY_ID`), KEY `PROJECT_METHODOLOGIES_TYPES` (`PROJECT_METHODOLOGIES_TYPE_ID`), CONSTRAINT `PROJECT_METHODOLOGIES_TYPES` FOREIGN KEY (`PROJECT_METHODOLOGIES_TYPE_ID`) REFERENCES `PROJECT_METHODOLOGIES_TYPES` (`PROJECT_METHODOLOGIES_TYPE_ID`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=2 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE `PROJECT_STAGES` ( `PROJECT_STAGE_ID` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `PROJECT_STAGE_TYPE_ID` int(11) NOT NULL, `EXECUTOR_ID` int(11) NOT NULL, `PROJECT_ID` int(11) NOT NULL, `PLAN_DATE_START` date DEFAULT NULL, `PLAN_DATE_END` date DEFAULT NULL, `FACT_DATE_START` date DEFAULT NULL, `FACT_DATE_END` date DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`PROJECT_STAGE_ID`), KEY `PROJECT_ID1` (`PROJECT_ID`), KEY `EXECUTOR_ID1` (`EXECUTOR_ID`), KEY `PROJECT_STAGE_TYPE_ID` (`PROJECT_STAGE_TYPE_ID`) USING BTREE, CONSTRAINT `EXECUTOR_ID1` FOREIGN KEY (`EXECUTOR_ID`) REFERENCES `EXECUTORS` (`EXECUTOR_ID`), CONSTRAINT `PROJECT_ID1` FOREIGN KEY (`PROJECT_ID`) REFERENCES `PROJECTS` (`PROJECT_ID`), CONSTRAINT `PROJECT_STAGE_NAME_ID` FOREIGN KEY (`PROJECT_STAGE_TYPE_ID`) REFERENCES `PROJECT_STAGE_TYPES` (`PROJECT_STAGE_TYPE_ID`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=4 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE `PROJECT_TASKS` ( `PROJECT_TASK_ID` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `PROJECT_TASK_NAME` varchar(1024) NOT NULL, `EXECUTOR_ID` int(11) NOT NULL, `PLAN_DATE_START` date DEFAULT NULL, `PLAN_DATE_END` date DEFAULT NULL, `FACT_DATE_START` date DEFAULT NULL, `FACT_DATE_END` date DEFAULT NULL, `PROJECT_STAGE_ID` int(11) NOT NULL, `PROJECT_TASK_TYPE_ID` int(11) NOT NULL, `PROJECT_TASK_PRIORITY_ID` int(11) NOT NULL, `PROJECT_TASK_STATUS_ID` int(11) NOT NULL, `PROJECT_TASK_ESTIMATION` int(11) NOT NULL, `PROJECT_TASK_STORY_POINTS` int(11) NOT NULL, `PROJECT_ID` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`PROJECT_TASK_ID`), KEY `EXECUTOR_ID2` (`EXECUTOR_ID`), KEY `PROJECT_STAGE_ID2` (`PROJECT_STAGE_ID`), KEY `PROJECT_TASK_TYPE_ID` (`PROJECT_TASK_TYPE_ID`), KEY `PROJECT_ID4` (`PROJECT_ID`), KEY `PROJECT_TASK_STATUS_ID` (`PROJECT_TASK_STATUS_ID`), KEY `PROJECT_TASK_PRIORITY` (`PROJECT_TASK_PRIORITY_ID`), CONSTRAINT `EXECUTOR_ID2` FOREIGN KEY (`EXECUTOR_ID`) REFERENCES `EXECUTORS` (`EXECUTOR_ID`) ON UPDATE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT `PROJECT_ID4` FOREIGN KEY (`PROJECT_ID`) REFERENCES `PROJECTS` (`PROJECT_ID`) ON UPDATE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT `PROJECT_STAGE_ID2` FOREIGN KEY (`PROJECT_STAGE_ID`) REFERENCES `PROJECT_STAGES` (`PROJECT_STAGE_ID`) ON UPDATE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT `PROJECT_TASK_PRIORITY` FOREIGN KEY (`PROJECT_TASK_PRIORITY_ID`) REFERENCES `PROJECT_TASK_PRIORITIES` (`PROJECT_TASK_PRIORITY_ID`) ON UPDATE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT `PROJECT_TASK_STATUS_ID` FOREIGN KEY (`PROJECT_TASK_STATUS_ID`) REFERENCES `PROJECT_TASK_STATUSES` (`PROJECT_TASK_STATUS_ID`) ON UPDATE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT `PROJECT_TASK_TYPE_ID` FOREIGN KEY (`PROJECT_TASK_TYPE_ID`) REFERENCES `PROJECT_TASK_TYPES` (`PROJECT_TASK_TYPE_ID`) ON UPDATE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE `PROJECT_TYPES` ( `PROJECT_TYPE_ID` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `PROJECT_ID` int(11) NOT NULL, `PROJECT_TYPE_NAME_ID` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`PROJECT_TYPE_ID`), KEY `PROJECT_ID` (`PROJECT_ID`), KEY `PROJECT_TYPE_ID` (`PROJECT_TYPE_NAME_ID`), CONSTRAINT `PROJECT_ID` FOREIGN KEY (`PROJECT_ID`) REFERENCES `PROJECTS` (`PROJECT_ID`) ON UPDATE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT `PROJECT_TYPE_ID` FOREIGN KEY (`PROJECT_TYPE_NAME_ID`) REFERENCES `PROJECT_TYPE_NAMES` (`PROJECT_TYPE_NAME_ID`) ON UPDATE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=4 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE `PROJECT_TYPE_NAMES` ( `PROJECT_TYPE_NAME_ID` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `NAME` varchar(1024) DEFAULT NULL, `PROJECT_TYPE_KIND_ID` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`PROJECT_TYPE_NAME_ID`), KEY `PROJECT_TYPE_KIND_ID` (`PROJECT_TYPE_KIND_ID`), CONSTRAINT `PROJECT_TYPE_KIND_ID` FOREIGN KEY (`PROJECT_TYPE_KIND_ID`) REFERENCES `PROJECT_TYPE_KINDS` (`PROJECT_TYPE_KIND_ID`) ON UPDATE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=3 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
